mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS (SELECT menu_no, menu_name, icon_url, menu_sort, IFNULL(upper_menu_no, 0) AS upper_menu_no, menu_code as URL, 1 AS depth, default_menu_code, menu_use, menu_code FROM menu WHERE IFNULL(upper_menu_no, 0) = 0 UNION ALL SELECT m.menu_no, m.menu_name, m.icon_url, m.menu_sort, IFNULL(m.upper_menu_no, 0), concat(C.URL, '/', m.menu_code) AS id_path, 1 + C.depth AS CLEVEL, m.default_menu_code, m.menu_use, m.menu_code FROM menu m INNER JOIN CTE C ON C.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no) SELECT menu_no AS menu_no, menu_name AS menu_name, icon_url, menu_sort, IFNULL(upper_menu_no, 0) AS upper_menu_no, URL, depth, default_menu_code, menu_use, menu_code FROM CTE ORDER BY URL ;
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE upper_menu_no IS NULL

select distinct m.menu_code from (WITH RECURSIVE findMainOrga AS (select tbl_orga.orga_no, tbl_orga.upper_orga_no, tbl_orga.orga_type from tbl_orga inner join tbl_emp_mapping eM on tbl_orga.orga_no = eM.orga_no inner join tbl_emp e on eM.emp_no = e.emp_no join tbl_dept_mapping d on tbl_orga.upper_orga_no = d.orga_no where username = #{username} and d.dept_main = true UNION ALL select o.orga_no, o.upper_orga_no, o.orga_type from findMainOrga f inner join tbl_orga o on f.upper_orga_no = o.orga_no) select f.orga_no, f.orga_type from findMainOrga f ) as f inner join tbl_orga_role o on o.orga_no = f.orga_no inner join tbl_role_group rg on o.role_group_no = rg.role_group_no join tbl_menu_role mr on rg.role_group_no = mr.role_group_no join tbl_menu m on mr.menu_no = m.menu_no order by f.orga_type
